de.slothsoft.charts

Interface GraphicContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DelegatingGraphicContext

    public interface GraphicContext
    Something you can draw on. This is used to have different frameworks interact with this library. Some notes:
    • drawX - means that getColor() will be used as the border of the figure X
    • fillX - means that getColor() will be used as the area of the figure X
    Classes are connected like this:

      Paints a filled rectangle.

    • Method Detail

      • setColor

        void setColor(int color)
        Sets the color as ARGB int, e.g. red is 0xFFFF0000 and blue is 0xFF0000FF.
        Parameters:
        color - the color

      • getColor

        int getColor()
        Returns the color as ARGB int, e.g. red is 0xFFFF0000 and blue is 0xFF0000FF.
        Returns:
        the color

      • translate

        void translate(double x,
               double y)
        Moves the drawing canvas's origin to the new coordinates.
        Parameters:
        x - translate x
        y - translate y

      • scale

        default void scale(double factor)
        Scales the drawing canvas with the factor.
        Parameters:
        factor - factor for both x and y

      • scale

        void scale(double x,
           double y)
        Scales the drawing canvas with the factor.
        Parameters:
        x - factor x
        y - factor y

      • clip

        void clip(Area rect)
        Restricts which area of the context can be used to drawn on. Set to null to remove the restriction again.
        Parameters:
        rect - the clipping area

      • drawLine

        default void drawLine(double x1,
                      double y1,
                      double x2,
                      double y2)
        Draws a simple line between two points.
        Parameters:
        x1 - - start point x
        y1 - - start point y
        x2 - - end point x
        y2 - - end point y

      • fillRectangle

        default void fillRectangle(Area rect)
        Paints a filled rectangle.
        Parameters:
        rect - the rectangle's coordinates

      • fillRectangle

        void fillRectangle(double x,
                   double y,
                   double width,
                   double height)
        Paints a filled rectangle.
        Parameters:
        x - the rectangle's x
        y - the rectangle's y
        width - the rectangle's width
        height - the rectangle's height

      • drawPolyline

        void drawPolyline(double[] x,
                  double[] y)
        Paints the outline of a polyline.
        Parameters:
        x - the polygon's x coordinates
        y - the polygon's y coordinates
